title: Voice Notes
description: Record and pin your voice notes on your drawings with Voice Notes, featuring voice recording, drawing tools, and social media integration.

details.description: Voice Notes is an application designed to enhance note-taking by allowing users to record and pin their voice notes directly on their drawings. It offers various tools such as voice recording, multiple pins for a single note, brushes, erasers, pencils, and text editing with different colors. Users can change the background to a suitable picture and share their creations on Facebook or via email.
features: Voice recording and pinning on notes
Multiple voice pins for a single note
Variety of drawing tools: brushes, erasers, pencils, text editor
Thumbnails of all drawings at the main view
Save notes as images or PDFs
Share on Facebook or via email
frameworks: Core Graphics for drawing and sketching
